description.narrative: This activity (Health Financing Support Program) is a component of Strategic Health and Nutrition Partnership reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £4,276,997. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Basic nutrition, Personnel development for population and reproductive health. , with the following implementing partners: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu India LLP. The start date is 01-03-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

sector.narrative: Personnel development for population and reproductive health
